price: Ó sọ pé: “Dájúdájú ẹ̀yin àti àwọn bàbá yín ti wà nínú ìṣìnà pọ́nńbélé.”
arabic: قَالَ لَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla laqad kuntum antum waābāukum fī ḍalālin mubīnin
